Docs.param: The generic type in the binding source to get the type argument from.
The type of the binding target property.
The zero-based position of the type argument to get. This corresponds to the position of the argument in the order it appears in the list of type arguments for the generic type.
Docs.summary: Returns the type argument at the specified parameter position of the specified generic type.
